Summary: They were the best of friends, the girl and the boy from the slums. Sleepovers, training sessions, reading together, playing board games, missions, secrets, traumas, movie nights, video games, there was little they didn't do together. Until he died. Sixteen years old and in the grave. Fourteen years old and lost in grief. Seven years have passed and it's time for Jason to finally pay her a visit.Â ( A/N: not the best summary but you get the point lol. don't expect this to be a comic accurate story. i will do my best to keep characters how they are represented in their media but i'm not holding myself to any particular story line. consider this an AU if you will. please check TW's. i will put chapter specific ones in the notes at the start of every chapter but for the first chapter i will try and cover all the potential triggers this story will cover. anyways, essentially this is a story where you are jason's childhood best friend, who isn't aware that he is alive. don't expect everything to make perfect sense, we will gain more backstory as we progress. enjoy xx.)
